programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: Several decades later, the community of Jefferson has formed their own theories and suspects behind the crime; unsettling questions explore the intersection of obsession and psychosis, and the haunting events that left a traumatic mark in Jefferson.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: Discovering the erotic art of trap burlesque; two teachers find their true calling; an ex-megachurch pastor embraces her carnal spirit.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: The Lookout, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Comic Paris Sashay grows up in a large family in the Washington, D.C., area; Paris' takes on racism, feminism and family slay the crowd at her home club, the DC Improv.

programme.title: Run the Tide, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When his drug-addicted mother leaves prison, a man (Taylor Lautner) kidnaps his younger brother (Nico Christou) and flees to the California coast for a better life.

programme.title: Happy Birthday!, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: When two friends embark on a journey to the seediest parts of Mexicali for a birthday celebration, they quickly realize their trip has taken a dangerous turn that involves sex, drugs, torture and a ransom involving the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: The Shootist, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: People pester an old, dying gunfighter (John Wayne) rooming with a widow (Lauren Bacall) in 1901 Nevada.

programme.title: Invaders From Mars, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A boy (Hunter Carson) sees his parents and neighbors act like zombies after a flying saucer lands in his back yard.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: The dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) beat the Grim Reaper (William Sadler) in a board-game contest, so he must help them stop their evil robot twins.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: Ben-Hur, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: A prince (Jack Huston) endures years of slavery to take vengeance on his adopted brother (Toby Kebbell), a Roman officer who falsely accused him of treason.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Daredevil operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) springs into action when four dangerous criminals steal Pandora's Box, a device that controls every military satellite in the world.

programme.title: Gladiator II, (2024, History)
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honor needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Stargate, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A portal takes an Egyptologist (James Spader), a colonel (Kurt Russell) and a team of soldiers to another planet with pyramids, slaves and an alien ruler.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: Several decades later, the community of Jefferson has formed their own theories and suspects behind the crime; unsettling questions explore the intersection of obsession and psychosis, and the haunting events that left a traumatic mark in Jefferson.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging irresponsible misfit (Paul Newman) falls in love with an unhappily married younger woman (Melanie Griffith).

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks, (2003, Children)
programme.desc: Recruited by the CIA, a teen works under cover to befriend a girl whose father unknowingly works for an evil organization.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: One-eyed Marshal "Rooster" Cogburn (John Wayne) and a Texas Ranger (Glen Campbell) help a girl (Kim Darby) find her father's killer.

programme.title: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: An inventor (Woody Allen), his wife (Mary Steenburgen) and two other couples spend an enchanted circa-1900 country weekend.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: An Old West sharpshooter goes to Australia, where his new boss expects him to kill Aboriginal Australians.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.title: The Peacemaker, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: A scientist (Nicole Kidman) and an Army Special Forces colonel (George Clooney) travel the globe in pursuit of stolen nuclear weapons.

programme.title: The Beekeeper, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: One man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after it's revealed he's a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: In the Land of Saints and Sinners, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: Hoping to leave his dark past behind him, former assassin Finbar Murphy leads a quiet life in a coastal Irish town. However, when terrorists show up, he must soon choose between exposing his secret identity and defending his friends and neighbors.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: One (Henry Fonda) of 12 jurors holds out in the case of a boy from the slums who is accused of killing his father.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London, (2004, Children)
programme.desc: A 16-year-old CIA agent (Frankie Muniz) poses as a clarinet prodigy while trying to recover stolen mind-control software.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: Exploring one's wild side with animal role play; reconnecting with a troubled couple; clowning around with a surprising dominatrix.

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Complications arise after two bachelors (Rupert Everett, Colin Firth) make use of the same pseudonym in 19th-century England.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: Goofy professor Kelp's potion turns him into Buddy Love, a lounge singer at ease with a coed and a crowd.

programme.title: Tommy's Honour, (2016, History)
programme.desc: Tom and Tommy Morris, father and son pioneers of professional golf, relied on skill, business acumen and working-class street smarts to make Tommy one of the world's first sports superstars and found the modern game of golf.

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Chaplin, (1992, Biography)
programme.desc: From London poverty to Hollywood legend, silent-film star Charlie Chaplin's (Robert Downey Jr.) life story is told.

programme.title: Chocolat, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: The mayor opposes a single mother (Juliette Binoche) who is opening a chocolate shop in his 1950s French village across from a church during Lent.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Raised to be an obstetrician at a Maine orphanage, a young man (Tobey Maguire) leaves to work at a cider mill with a soldier's beloved (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: The Boys in the Boat, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: During the height of the Great Depression, members of the rowing team at the University of Washington get thrust into the spotlight as they compete for gold at the 1936 Olympics in Berlin.

programme.title: September 5, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: During the 1972 Munich Olympics, an American sports broadcasting crew finds itself thrust into covering the hostage crisis involving Israeli athletes.

programme.title: The Fire Inside, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: The Wasp, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: A marshal (Lee Van Cleef), an Eastern reporter and five ex-convicts rescue widows from Mexican bandits.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: An aspiring teenage rock journalist gets his big break when he follows an up-and-coming band on its tour.

programme.title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: With their futures threatened by false accusations of cheating, three teenagers take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Friend, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: A journalist (Naomi Watts) investigates the mystery behind a bizarre videotape that brings death after seven days to all who view it.

programme.title: The Woman in Black, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer (Daniel Radcliffe) encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: The Friend, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: While in jail for murdering her husband (Bruce Greenwood), a woman (Ashley Judd) discovers he is living under a new identity with their son.

programme.title: Captive, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recovering drug addict Ashley Smith (Kate Mara) reads Rick Warren's "The Purpose Driven Life" as armed fugitive Brian Nichols (David Oyelowo) holds her hostage in her apartment.

programme.title: Crisis, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her son's disappearance.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: A journalist (Naomi Watts) investigates the mystery behind a bizarre videotape that brings death after seven days to all who view it.

programme.title: The Woman in Black, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer (Daniel Radcliffe) encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: While in jail for murdering her husband (Bruce Greenwood), a woman (Ashley Judd) discovers he is living under a new identity with their son.

programme.title: Sid & Judy, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Fifty years after the untimely death of Sid Luft's wife, Judy Garland, his journal provides insight into their marriage.

programme.title: Mourning in Lod, (2023, Documentary)
programme.desc: The fates of three families become inextricably intertwined when a Palestinian citizen is killed by a Jewish settler in the city of Lod, Israel, and deadly riots break out.

programme.title: India Sweets and Spices, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: After returning from college, young Alia upends her family's well-ordered life with her brash new independence. When secrets about her parents come to light during a dinner party, it soon pushes her to a daring and ultimately hilarious confrontation.

programme.title: Student Bodies, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: A virginal high school student vows to catch an anonymous killer known only as "the Breather" (Richard Brando), who is terrorizing her classmates by killing every student who indulges in sex.

programme.title: Burke & Hare, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two 19th-century opportunists (Simon Pegg, Andy Serkis) become serial killers so that they can maintain their profitable business supplying cadavers to an anatomist (Tom Wilkinson).

programme.title: The Sense of an Ending, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A business owner (Jim Broadbent) reunites with his first love (Charlotte Rampling) after a letter and a diary force him to confront the past.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: The experiences of two soldiers in Afghanistan ties together separate stories unfolding in California and Washington, D.C.

programme.title: Case 39, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: A social worker (Rene Zellweger) saves a girl (Jodelle Ferland) from abusive parents but finds there is more to the child than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small town High School students, including an introverted photographer and a drug dealer, begin to suspect something's off with their teachers. They realize that the faculty is under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites.

programme.title: Frida, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: A plane passenger (Cillian Murphy) forcibly involves his seatmate (Rachel McAdams) in a plot to assassinate a government official.

programme.title: Cusp, (2021, Documentary)
programme.desc: Filmmakers Parker Hill and Isabel Bethencourt share a fascinating glimpse into authentic American girlhood, where the strictures of adolescence clash with the growing desire for personal agency.

programme.title: Fear the Night, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: When masked intruders attack eight women at a remote farmhouse, Tess, a military veteran, leads them in a final stand as they fight back to save themselves and survive the night.

programme.title: Cinma, (2023, History)
programme.desc: Jeanne uses her charms and intelligence to climb the social ladder. Against all convention, she becomes one of the favorites of King Louis XV and moves to Versailles.

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: A plane passenger (Cillian Murphy) forcibly involves his seatmate (Rachel McAdams) in a plot to assassinate a government official.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: The Free World, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, a man (Boyd Holbrook) goes on the run with a woman (Elisabeth Moss) who's suspected of killing her abusive husband.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet, (2025, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby, (1968, Horror)
programme.desc: A pregnant woman's (Mia Farrow) husband (John Cassavetes) and their satanic neighbors want her baby to be the Antichrist.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: A young man (Matt Damon) travels to 1950s Italy and begins to assume the identity of a playboy (Jude Law) he was hired to bring back to the United States.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: A senatorial candidate (Ralph Fiennes) falls for a chambermaid (Jennifer Lopez) after he mistakes her for a guest (Natasha Richardson) at the hotel.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet, (2025, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Hard Truths, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Pansy, angry and depressed, lashes out at family and strangers. Her constant criticism isolates her, except from her cheerful sister Chantelle, who remains sympathetic despite their differences.

programme.title: Dreamland, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Backcountry, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: A couple (Missy Peregrym, Jeff Roop) on a deep-wilderness hike become hopelessly lost within an aggressive black bear's territory.

programme.title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: Lorine Padilla joins a street gang in the Bronx, N.Y., before becoming an activist and spiritual adviser.

programme.title: Flypaper, (2011, Comedy)
programme.desc: A man tries to protect a teller, whom he secretly loves, after two groups rob her bank at the same time.

programme.title: Mass, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Two couples meet for a painful and raw conversation in the aftermath of a violent tragedy.

programme.title: Marvelous and the Black Hole, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: A rebellious 13-year-old who is dealing with the loss of her mother embarks on an adventure with a children's party magician.

programme.title: Masterminds, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: When the man she loves, Holger Olsen, goes off to fight in the Civil War, Vivienne Le Coudy must fend for herself in a place controlled by a corrupt mayor and his unscrupulous business partner.

programme.title: Love Me, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: A buoy and a satellite meet online long after humanity's extinction. As they learn what life was like on Earth, they discover themselves and what it means to be alive and in love.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Masterminds, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.desc: Na iminncia da paternidade, um mecnico jnior a bordo de uma arca interestelar para a Nova Terra precisa enganar um terror csmico malvolo que pretende usar a espaonave como arma.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Aps os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de gua na Terra, uma nave enviada at Tit, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a misso de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: A Colnia, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Em 2018, depois de um desastre pela mudana climtica que levou a uma nova idade do gelo, um clandesttino reduto de sobreviventes devem lutar para preservar a humanidade de uma ameaa mais selvagem do que os elementos.

programme.title: Impacto, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um professor de astronomia da NASA faz a terrvel descoberta de que um asteroide destruidor est em rota de coliso com a Terra e precisar proteger sua famlia enquanto alerta o mundo sobre a iminente devastao.

programme.title: Cobra Gigante, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um professor de biologia tentando salvar sua filha doente com uma cura natural vai para a selva com especialistas e encontra um horror maior que a vida.

programme.title: A Hospedeira, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um inimigo invisvel ameaa a humanidade assumindo seus corpos e apagando suas memrias, Melanie Stryder arrisca tudo para proteger as pessoas com quem se importa.

programme.title: Equilibrium, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Num futuro incerto, a raa humana foi quase totalmente devastada da Terra. Para salvar o mundo, os governantes decidiram criar uma droga capaz de inibir o sentimento humano e garantir a paz para sempre.

programme.title: 2:22- Encontro Marcado, (2017, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A vida de um homem sai dos trilhos quando um padro ameaador de eventos se repete exatamente da mesma maneira todos os dias, terminando precisamente s 2:22.

programme.title: Get Smart, Again: The Movie, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Neste segundo renascimento da srie de televiso Get Smart, Maxwell Smart revive seus dias de agente secreto ao reunir colegas para frustrar um plano da KAOS de alcanar a dominao mundial.

programme.title: Atrada pelo Crime, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma adolescente que adora as revistas "Crimes Reais" tenta solucionar o violento assassinato de uma de suas colegas de turma, procurando a ajuda de um policial em formao.

programme.title: Os Intocveis, (1987, Drama)
programme.desc: Este confronto clssico entre o bem e o mal estrelado por Kevin Costner , Robert De Niro e Sean Connery , o policial que ensina Ness a vencer a multido: atirar rpido e atirar primeiro.

programme.title: Atrada Pelo Perigo, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de testemunhar um assassinato da mfia, a aspirante a artista Anne Benton comea uma nova vida sob o programa de proteo a testemunhas. No entanto, no demora muito para que o assassino perigoso Milo a encontre e lhe d um ultimato chocante.

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: Temporada de Caa, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Wade Whitehouse um policial de uma pequena cidade. Isolado das pessoas ao seu redor, incluindo um pai dominador e uma mulher divorciada, ele se torna obcecado com a resoluo de um acidente de caa fatal, levando a uma srie de acontecimentos trgicos.

programme.title: O Morro dos Ventos Uivantes, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A eterna histria de amor e paixo de Emily Bront ganha vida nesta verso cinematogrfica inspiradora, estrelada por Juliette Binoche e Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: Atrada Pelo Perigo, (1990, Drama)

programme.title: O Direito de Viver, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Um grupo de ativistas, feministas e um mdico decidem abrir um processo contra o governo dos EUA para legalizar o aborto e para isso criam um dos maiores embates sociais e jurdicos da histria.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: O Direito de Viver, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Um grupo de ativistas, feministas e um mdico decidem abrir um processo contra o governo dos EUA para legalizar o aborto e para isso criam um dos maiores embates sociais e jurdicos da histria.

programme.title: Uma Jornada de Perdo, (2018, Drama)

programme.title: Milagre de Lourdes, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Entre fevereiro e julho de 1858, na gruta de Massabielle, a Virgem Maria apareceu dezoito vezes para Bernadette Soubirous. Um lobo solitrio e um punk rebelde se apaixonam e so forados a fugir. Eles descobrem que a violncia os segue por toda parte.

programme.title: Separao e Reencontro, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Separados aps o divrcio e sem qualquer contato por 12 anos, pai e filha se reencontram para uma longa viagem cruzando o pas. A jornada se torna mais complicada do que eles poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Uma questo de F, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma garota crist vai para a faculdade iniciar seu primeiro ano e comea a ser influenciada por seu professor de biologia, que ensina que a evoluo a resposta para as origens da vida.

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Roma, procurando pelo misterioso Enrique. Zombando do desafio de Beyblade, Enrique decide que prefere passar o dia com algumas de suas amigas.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: No querendo deixar sua derrota inicial para Enrique o perturbar, Tyson fica ocupado refazendo seu Beyblade. Com Enrique duvidando de sua prpria tcnica, e Oliver visitando-o da Frana em Roma, o cenrio est pronto para uma revanche.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: Enrique e Oliver decidem levar nossos heris em um passeio dirigvel para visitar o castelo de Robert. O motivo - Tyson espera vingar uma perda anterior para Robert que aconteceu a bordo do navio que chegou Europa.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers se sentiram em casa na manso de Robert, recusando-se a sair, a menos que os europeus concordassem em um Beybattle final. Para ensinar uma lio a seus convidados, Robert concorda em uma partida em seu novo estdio.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: A segunda partida comea no Olympia Coliseum e, com os dois lutadores recebendo ajuda no solicitada de seus respectivos companheiros de equipe, Kai consegue derrotar Johnny.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Moscou em antecipao ao torneio final do World Beyblading. Enquanto procuram seu hotel na cidade fria, eles encontram Boris, um homem estranho que afirma ser o chefe de um centro de treinamento de Beyblading.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: Legado de Violncia, (2020, Thriller)

programme.title: Intermedirio.com, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria real. O empresrio Jack Harris tem uma linda famlia e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemticas. At que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Miuga entrega uma mensagem para Totosai. Ele diz que a Tessaiga ficar mais forte se cortar derrotar um poderoso youkai. O grupo procura ento os youkais morcegos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Me e os Sentimentos de Shiori

programme.title: O youkai morcego tenta destruir a aldeia junto com a me de Shiori. Inuyasha bloqueado pela barreira da menina e no consegue derrot-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Tessaiga Vermelha que Quebra a Barreira

programme.title: A tribo youkais Gatos do Fogo ataca do oeste. Seu objetivo obter os fragmentos da Jia de Agome, bem como se vingar de Sesshomaru e Inuyasha, filhos do grande co youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conspirao dos Quatro Youkais Gatos de Fogo

programme.title: Inuyasha corta a barreira e junto com o Kuga, eles entram no castelo. Enquanto isso, Mirok e Sango caram sob um feitio, e Agome est presa em uma priso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Alvos so Sesshomaru e Inuyasha

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, comea a se mover com o poder da Jia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a mmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos

programme.title: Sango convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrs. Kuranosuke tem aparncia, status e riqueza. Sango est confusa sobre como ela recusar sua proposta de casamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A Tessaiga est equipada com uma tcnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roub-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga

programme.title: Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolver Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai at o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presena da Jia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin

programme.title: Narak est tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak v que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O ano 1987. Joseph vai at o Japo quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possudo por espritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O homem possudo por um esprito maligno

programme.title: Jotaro volta vida normal, mas esconde o que Joseph chama de "Stand". A caminho da escola, o mesmo Jotaro se machuca e conhece um aluno chamado Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro ignora os protestos de Joseph e tenta usar seu Stand para impedir que DIO continue controlando o crebro de Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin ataca um Stand sem saber quem o seu usurio. Jotaro e seus aliados encontram um dos assassinos a mando de DIO no voo para o Egito.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vitria parece certa quando Avdol usa seus poderes contra o assassino Polnareff, que tem a mente controlada por DIO. Quem ser o vencedor desta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados viajam at Singapura pelo mar. Um Stand com usurio desconhecido ataca Jotaro assim que um passageiro clandestino encontrado no navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro encontra um orangotango em um cargueiro que parece abandonado. Durante uma busca no barco, eles se deparam com algo misterioso.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro chega ao hotel em Singapura, mas Polnareff cai direto na armadilha de um usurio de Stand ao entrar no quarto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro comea a desconfiar que Kakyoin esteja possudo quando ele age de modo estranho e espanca brutalmente um ladro em Singapura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff parte sozinho para vingar a irm depois de ser atacado por um estranho Stand que s pode ser visto no reflexo de um espelho.

programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado Parte 1

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff v um caminho no sentido contrrio. Ser que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff atacado por um exrcito de zumbis aps descobrir que a velhinha responsvel pelo hotel uma usuria de Stand.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff percebe que a espada de Chaka um Stand quando atacado por seu barbeiro. O problema que a espada est mais poderosa desde a ltima luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados chegam cidade de Luxor, e Joseph leva um choque ao tocar uma estranha pedra com uma tomada eltrica.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff nota que seus sapatos aumentaram de tamanho subitamente aps tentar perseguir um homem que o seguia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff, numa verso criana, precisa enfrentar o usurio de Stand Alessi contando apenas com seu minsculo Stand. Na hora H, ele recorre a uma soluo impensvel.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.title: Em Busca do Portal Mgico, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A quieta e divertida Monika se muda para uma nova casa e faz amizade com David. Juntos, eles encontram um relgio mgico capaz de faz-los viajar no tempo. Mas seria essa a soluo para os problemas de todos?

programme.title: Um Garoto no Palcio de Aladim, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Calvin, um jovem entregador de pizza, confundido com o "Grande Libertador" por um gnio, que o atrai de volta ao sculo VIII, onde deve unir foras com Ali Bab para salvar toda a Arbia do irmo maligno de Aladim, Luxor.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um arquelogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistrio de Ragnarok Porm, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Misso Quase Impossvel, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espio Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difcil at hoje: cuidar dos trs filhos de sua namorada, que no gostaram muito do namorado de sua me.

programme.title: Em Nome do Rei: A ltima Misso, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um assassino moderno, contratado para uma tarefa final: sequestrar as filhas de uma Famlia real europia. As coisas vo loucura quando descobrimos que ele escolheu voltar Idade Mdia e trazer de volta a ordem a um reino no caos.

programme.title: O Menino e o Urso, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos campos gelados do norte do Canad do norte, Luke descobre que um filhote de urso polar jovem foi separado de sua me e tenta encontrar uma maneira de reunir os dois.

programme.title: Os Sete Corvos, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.title: Expedio Kon-Tiki, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1947, apesar do medo da gua e da incapacidade de nadar, Heyerdahl decidiu testar sua teoria. Ele e cinco companheiros navegam do Peru em uma jangada de madeira construda com um design antigo.

programme.title: Em Nome do Rei: A ltima Misso, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um assassino moderno, contratado para uma tarefa final: sequestrar as filhas de uma Famlia real europia. As coisas vo loucura quando descobrimos que ele escolheu voltar Idade Mdia e trazer de volta a ordem a um reino no caos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingana do drago, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendrio lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmo de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingana.

programme.title: Aliana Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canad-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Foras Especiais, a ajud-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Batalha dos Imprios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legio de mil soldados no pas e com o comandante do protetorado das Regies Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os mtodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trnsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da priso em busca de vingana.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingana, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeo de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporao multibilionria, se junta a uma informante da polcia, para investigar a morte de seu irmo assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: The Angel Levine, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: A sentimental tale of an elderly Jewish tailor (Zero Mostel) who has lost his faith in God and himself. Enter a Jewish angel (Harry Belafonte), on probation, who must earn his wings by convincing the tailor that life does have meaning.

programme.title: Kiss Me, Stupid, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this comic gem from the legendary Billy Wilder and his long-time writing partner I.A.L. Diamond, Dean Martin is a famous singer targeted by two would-be songwriters who encourage a waitress (Kim Novak) to coerce Dino into a song-buying mood.

programme.title: Topkapi, (1964, Thriller)
programme.desc: Peter Ustinov won an Oscar for Best Supporting Actor in this lighthearted thriller about five thieves (including Melina Mercouri, Maximilian Schell, and Robert Morley) who undertake an absolutely impossible grand theft in Istanbul.

programme.title: Lilies of the Field, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: The Miracle Worker, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Academy Awards went to Best Actress Anne Bancroft and Best Supporting Actress Patty Duke for their moving portrayals of Annie Sullivan and her remarkable blind and deaf pupil, Helen Keller.

programme.title: The Fugitive Kind, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: In this Tennessee Williams masterpiece, Marlon Brando is superb as a paradoxical drifter drawn into the desperate lives of two passionate women, Maureen Stapleton and Joanne Woodward, in a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: Oliver Twist, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.

programme.title: Great Expectations, (1946, Drama)
programme.desc: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Guns Akimbo, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A guy relies on his newly acquired gladiator skills to save his ex-girlfriend from kidnappers.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
