programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakuras pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimarus lair with Sasuke in hand. Theyre discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobos Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja dont bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: Kill The Irishman, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.

programme.title: Stand Up Guys, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, and Alan Arkin star in this action-comedy about retired gangsters who reunite for one last epic night.

programme.title: Takers, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: After pulling off a spectacular series of bank heists, the TAKERS plan a once-in-a-lifetime job with a $25 million payoff. And all that stands in their way is a cop hell-bent on doing whatever it takes to solve the case and bring them down.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband shes convicted of murdering staged his own death and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find himand that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III [Cantonese-Language Version], (1989, Action)
programme.desc: A man travels from China to Vietnam, on the brink of war with America, to retrieve his uncle and cousin but find complications when he falls in love with a female gangster with a dangerous ex.

programme.title: Barefoot In The Park, (1967, Romance)
programme.desc: Robert Redford is Mister Straight. Jane Fonda is his new wife. As the ecstasy of the honeymoon gives way to the reality of setting up housekeeping in a five-flight walk-up, the harmony of marriage turns to comical discord.

programme.title: Downhill Racer, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: An ambitious American Skier gains a place on the team competing in Europe.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Redford stars as Jay Gatsby, who had once loved beautiful, spoiled Daisy Buchanan (Mia Farrow), then lost her to a rich boy. But now Gatsby is mysteriously wealthy...and ready to risk everything to woo Daisy back.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Demi Moore and Woody Harrelson are Diana and David Murphy, a financially strapped couple who are betting on a quick trip to Las Vegas to deal them a lucky hand. But the odds are suddenly even more attractive when billionaire John Gage ups the ante.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: An Unfinished Life, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Einar Gilkyson (Robert Redford) lives in the Wyoming ranchlands with his only friend, Mitch (Morgan Freeman). Then, suddenly, the woman he blames for his son's death arrives at his door broke, desperate, and with a granddaughter he's never known.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A group of Chicago real-estate salesmen and con artists live on the edge.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: In one of the greatest road movies of all time, Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon ride to everlasting fame as two women who embark on a crime spree across the American southwest.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Action and romance take to the screen when a self-centered ex-hockey star (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna champion figure skater (Moira Kelly) become unlikely partners in pursuit of Olympic gold.

programme.title: Music Of The Heart, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for two Academy Awards, Angela Bassett, Meryl Streep, Cloris Leachman and Gloria Estefan headline this heartwarming, acclaimed true story of how one woman's musical gift affected those who least expected it.

programme.title: The Birdcage, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: Robin Williams, Gene Hackman, Nathan Lane and Dianne Wiest lead the laughs in this wild Comedy that insists you don't have to be a woman to be a mother.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Big Night, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: In a restaurant run by two Italian immigrants, the tables sit empty despite the extraordinary talents of Primo the chef (Tony Shalhoub, Monk) and the ambitious efforts of his brother Secondo (Stanley Tucci).

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!

programme.title: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica's giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steady Progress! Luffys Army vs. Pica!

programme.title: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!

programme.title: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!

programme.title: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!

programme.title: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Escape! Luffy's Tide-turning Elephant Gun!

programme.title: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks towards a unified plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A United Front! Luffy's Breakthrough to the Victory!

programme.title: Hidden far underground, Kin'emon finds his old friend Kanjuro whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!

programme.title: The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Seor Pink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro's Deadly Attack!

programme.title: Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Little People's Princess! Captive Mansherry!

programme.title: Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius' exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!

programme.title: Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Risking Their Lives! Luffy is the Trump Card for Victory!

programme.title: Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!

programme.title: Usopp uses Viola's Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster, and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp's ammunition has been specially designed for this situation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!

programme.title: The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy's own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Seor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law's Ultimate Stratagem!

programme.title: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!

programme.title: With Fujitora's stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law's traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad Memories! Law, the Boy from the White Town!

programme.title: Law's attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he's accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon's mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law's life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Celestial Dragon! Doffy's Stormy Past!

programme.title: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon's actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon's Journey of Life!

programme.title: Corazon's double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon's hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Moment of Resolution! Corazon's Farewell Smile!

programme.title: Doflamingo & his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law's whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape, even if that means sacrificing his own life. A chain of lucky coincidences allows the plan to be set into motion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man's Final Fight!

programme.title: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it's Law's revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Be Free! Law's Injection Shot Blasts!

programme.title: Luffy continues to battle Fake-mingo, but keeps accidentally battling Bellamy instead. Meanwhile the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface. And Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Intense Battle! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Bellamy escapes Doflamingo's control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle Against the Executives! Proud Hajrudin!

programme.title: Lao G and Don Chinjao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of Love! The New Leader Sai vs. Baby 5!

programme.title: Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man's Pride! Bellamy's Last Charge!

programme.title: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield - but while it appears to help Bartolomeo and the others at first, it sets its sights on Robin! Meanwhile, the deeply-wounded Ideo sees Dellinger's horrible true nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Strong Wind and a Surge! Hakuba vs. Dellinger!

programme.title: Bartolomeo is in a neck-and-neck battle against Gladius to save Robin, and is faced with an impossible dilemma. With all his options leading to their defeat, can his cunning ploy save the day? Meanwhile, Robin is face to face with Cavendish.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Princess Mansherry's amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who've gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Seor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Seor's tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Manly Duel! Seor's Elegy of Love!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".
programme.sub-title: The Girl in the Twin Towers

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.
programme.sub-title: The Killers Gather in the Wasteland

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.
programme.sub-title: Zenigata's Pride and the Desert Dust

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chlo's Bistro. Chlo is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Automata, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her familyand unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Cosmic Sin, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and Frank Grillo star in the epic sci-fi adventure set in the year 2524. Retired General Ford (Willis) partners with General Eron Ryle (Grillo) and a team of elite soldiers in a race to stop an interstellar war before it's too late.

programme.title: Flame Of Barbary Coast, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: A cowboy competes with a gambling tycoon on the Barbary Coast for the hand of a beautiful dance-hall queen.

programme.title: The Dark Command, (1940, Drama)
programme.desc: A Civil War tale based on the exploits of the notorious outlaw William Quantrill. A courageous sheriff stands up to Quantrill and his band of guerrillas pillaging the countryside in Civil War-torn Kansas, and stops the raids.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: In Old California, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: The Duke plays a young, ambitious pharmacist who moves into a brawling frontier town but locks horns with a local crime lord, bent on keeping the town for himself.

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats, (1943, Drama)
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: The story of Marisa Ventura (Jennifer Lopez), a single mother born in the boroughs of New York City, who works as a maid in a first-class Manhattan hotel. By a twist of fate and mistaken identity, Marisa meets Christopher Marshall (Ralph Fiennes)

programme.title: Friends with Benefits, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiyas star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagis house as her younger sister.

programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.

programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where shes getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiyas jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagis attention.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moons true identity.

programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.
programme.sub-title: Crusade for the Galaxy: Legend of the Sailor Wars

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that shes been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.

programme.sub-title: Countdown to Destruction: The Sailor Guardians' Last Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxias attack.
programme.sub-title: Ruler of the Galaxy: The Menace of Galaxia

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia.
programme.sub-title: Dying Stars: Uranus and Neptune's Last Stand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos. She has become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself.

programme.desc: Usagi Tsukino is a schoolgirl who meets a talking cat named Luna. Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the guardian who fights for love and justice.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that shes gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.

programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.

programme.desc: After his safe cracking grandfather dies, Johnny is the only person who can open a safe for a degenerate crew of gangsters.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Escape Plan: The Extractors, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ray Breslin and his team of security experts fight to rescue Breslin's girlfriend and a tech mogul's daughter from a formidable prison known as Devil's Station.

programme.title: In the Blood, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: After his safe cracking grandfather dies, Johnny is the only person who can open a safe for a degenerate crew of gangsters.

programme.title: Rambo: Last Blood, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: War veteran John Rambo tries to find some semblance of peace by raising horses on a ranch in Arizona. But when a vicious Mexican cartel kidnaps a teenage girl, Rambo embarks on a bloody and personal quest to rescue her and punish those responsible.

programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again.

programme.desc: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

programme.title: Big Fish, (2003, Science fiction)

programme.title: Eye of the Beholder, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.
Spearhead enjoys a brief respite near the cherry blossoms outside the wall, but a deadly attack brings the dangers of war even closer to home.
As the day of the festival arrives, Lena and Shin watch the fireworks and enjoy a brief respite from their battles.
Spearhead gets orders to undertake a pointless march into enemy territory, and not to stop until they're dead; Lena tries her best to stop this suicide mission from happening.
Shin confronts his brother deep within Legion territory.

programme.title: Jogada de Risco
programme.desc: John (John C. Reilly), um fracassado encalhado em Reno, est duro. a que chega Sydney, que fica com pena dele, paga um caf da manh e lhe d algumas dicas sobre como ganhar dinheiro nos cassinos. Dois anos depois, John torna-se parceiro de Sydney.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Co de briga
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos.

programme.title: Caada Implacvel
programme.desc: Quando um grupo de guerreiros fugitivos pega Rhodes e sua filha como refm, um desejo imenso de vingana vai dominar seu territrio. E ele no vai ter d de quem ousar cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Desaparecidos
programme.desc: Alice Launey, uma especialista forense francesa ainda assombrada por seu passado, vem a Seul para apresentar seu trabalho. Ela conhecer JinHo, um detetive que pede sua ajuda em um caso de assassinato.

programme.title: Zona Mortal
programme.desc: Um criminoso consegue fugir de paraquedas quando transportado em um avio da polcia. Por causa disso, o agente Pete Nessip que o acompanhava suspenso, mas decide procurar o preso fugitivo por conta prpria.

programme.title: O Rei das Armas
programme.desc: Um criminoso se rene com um velho amigo aps uma troca de armas fracassada.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: A Casa Silenciosa
programme.desc: Uma jovem fica presa dentro do refgio beira do lago de sua famlia e se torna incapaz de entrar em contato com o mundo exterior enquanto foras sobrenaturais assombram a casa com energias e consequncias misteriosas.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 4
programme.desc: Jigsaw e sua aprendiz Amanda morreram. Depois de ficarem sabendo do homicdio do Detetive Kerry, dois agentes veteranos do FBI, Agente Strahm e Agente Perez, auxiliam o Detetive Hoffman a organizar os restos do ltimo jogo de Jigsaw.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 5
programme.desc: No quinto captulo da franquia Jogos Mortais, o Detetive Hoffman parece ser a ltima pessoa viva a continuar o legado do Jigsaw. Mas quando o seu segredo ameaado, Hoffman precisa ir caa para eliminar todos os assuntos inacabados.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 6
programme.desc: O Agente Especial Strahm est morto, e o Detetive Hoffman emergiu como sucessor indiscutvel do legado do Jigsaw. Porm, quando o FBI se aproxima de Hoffman, ele forado a iniciar o jogo, e o grande esquema do Jigsaw finalmente compreendido.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trs dos jogos cruis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polcia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 4
programme.desc: Jigsaw e sua aprendiz Amanda morreram. Depois de ficarem sabendo do homicdio do Detetive Kerry, dois agentes veteranos do FBI, Agente Strahm e Agente Perez, auxiliam o Detetive Hoffman a organizar os restos do ltimo jogo de Jigsaw.

programme.title: Jogada de Mestre
programme.desc: Conta a histria do "sequestro mais famoso do sculo": em 1983, o magnata da cerveja Alfred Henry Heineken sequestrado, junto com seu motorista, por uma gangue que exige US$ 50 milhes por sua liberdade.

programme.title: Jennifer 8 - A Prxima Vtima
programme.desc: Elas so vtimas de uma srie de assassinatos no resolvidos: mulheres mortas por um assassino frio e identificadas nos arquivos da polcia pelo cdigo "Jennifer".

programme.title: Os Suspeitos
programme.desc: Cinco criminosos de carreira so apanhados no enredo labirntico do filme que envolve um gnio do crime intrigante, raramente visto e quase lendrio chamado Keyser Soze.

programme.title: A Marca
programme.desc: Uma detetive de polcia est envolvida em um caso em que descobre que todas as vtimas de assassinato so seus ex-amigos.

programme.title: Assassinatos em Boston
programme.desc: Matt Sorenson um ex-boxeador que tambm policial. Ele tenta elucidar a brutal morte de seu irmo mais novo, Michael, e para isto precisa se infiltrar em algo desconhecido para ele: a prtica do sadomasoquismo.

programme.title: Agentes Duplos
programme.desc: Danny Gallagher, um desacreditado detetive da narcticos recm sado da priso, busca vingana da pessoa responsvel pela a acusao que o levou a ser preso e que matou seu parceiro.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs. Mecha Shark
programme.desc: Quando um novo Mega Shark ameaa a humanidade, o governo desencadeia o secreto Mecha Shark para derrotar o monstro em uma batalha campal que ameaa o planeta.

programme.title: Grito Silencioso
programme.desc: Uma cidade inteira vtima de uma sanguinria criatura que caa humanos baseando-se em sons. Ser uma silenciosa batalha pela sobrevivnvia!

programme.title: Assassinos do Espao
programme.desc: Em um dia normal, cinco amigos saem para beber noite, mas, coisas estranhas comeam a acontecer. As luzes apagam, os telefones no funcionam e uma invaso de naves aliengenas escurece o cu.

programme.title: Especial Mundos Alternativos: Ameaa no Espao
programme.desc: Na iminncia da paternidade, um mecnico jnior a bordo de uma arca interestelar para a Nova Terra precisa enganar um terror csmico malvolo que pretende usar a espaonave como arma.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua
programme.desc: Aps os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de gua na Terra, uma nave enviada at Tit, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a misso de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: A Colnia
programme.desc: Em 2018, depois de um desastre pela mudana climtica que levou a uma nova idade do gelo, um clandesttino reduto de sobreviventes devem lutar para preservar a humanidade de uma ameaa mais selvagem do que os elementos.

programme.title: Segredos de um crime
programme.desc: Malcolm um detetive respeitado pelos colegas policiais. Um dia, no entanto, ele acidentalmente atropela um garoto em uma bicicleta. Apesar de chamar a ambulncia imediatamente, a vtima corre srio risco de morte.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: Esquina da Morte
programme.desc: Um intenso thriller de mfia, baseado em fatos reais, mostra um sargento da Marinha que retorna da guerra apenas para encontrar sua famlia em meio a um violento conflito com a Mfia da Filadlfia.

programme.title: Projeto Pandora
programme.desc: Um agente da CIA precisa deter um ex-associado que roubou uma arma que mata pessoas sem danificar prdios, tudo isso antes de ele se casar em poucos dias.

programme.title: O Drago Invencvel
programme.desc: Um agente da polcia paisana procura vingana contra um sindicato do crime implacvel aps o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: A partida decisiva das finais dos torneios americanos se resume a Max vs. Michael, do 'All Starz', em uma batalha que coloca cincia e tecnologia contra o esprito humano.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E28

programme.title: Depois de derrotar por pouco o All Starz no Torneio Americano, Kenny decide que ele deve registrar um banco de dados dos pontos altos e baixos dos BladeBreakers desde o incio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E29

programme.title: Viajando de barco pelo Atlntico, os Bladebreakers devem no apenas lidar com o enjoo de Kenny, mas uma revelao devastadora.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E31

programme.title: Depois que seu trem misteriosamente sequestrado, as crianas se encontram nos recessos escuros de um tnel. aqui que os Bladebreakers encontram um grupo de fantasmas zumbis, os Dark Bladers.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E32

programme.title: Enquanto os Bladebreakers vo para o Campeonato do Mundo na Rssia, eles ficam presos em Paris, onde acabam perdendo um dia procurando Kai que desapareceu misteriosamente.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E33

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E34

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Roma, procurando pelo misterioso Enrique. Zombando do desafio de Beyblade, Enrique decide que prefere passar o dia com algumas de suas amigas.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E35

programme.title: No querendo deixar sua derrota inicial para Enrique o perturbar, Tyson fica ocupado refazendo seu Beyblade. Com Enrique duvidando de sua prpria tcnica, e Oliver visitando-o da Frana em Roma, o cenrio est pronto para uma revanche.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E36

programme.title: Enrique e Oliver decidem levar nossos heris em um passeio dirigvel para visitar o castelo de Robert. O motivo - Tyson espera vingar uma perda anterior para Robert que aconteceu a bordo do navio que chegou Europa.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E37

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers se sentiram em casa na manso de Robert, recusando-se a sair, a menos que os europeus concordassem em um Beybattle final. Para ensinar uma lio a seus convidados, Robert concorda em uma partida em seu novo estdio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E38

programme.title: A segunda partida comea no Olympia Coliseum e, com os dois lutadores recebendo ajuda no solicitada de seus respectivos companheiros de equipe, Kai consegue derrotar Johnny.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E39

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Moscou em antecipao ao torneio final do World Beyblading. Enquanto procuram seu hotel na cidade fria, eles encontram Boris, um homem estranho que afirma ser o chefe de um centro de treinamento de Beyblading.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E40

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers encontram alguns velhos amigos na Rssia quando All Starz e o White Tiger Clan aparecem para uma partida de exibio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E41

programme.title: Kai est dividido entre escapar da Abadia, agora conhecida como Biovolt Corporation (sigla para Beybladers com inteno de vitria sobre a tirania sem lei), ou explor-la ainda mais na tentativa de desvendar memrias esquecidas de sua infncia.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E42

programme.title: o primeiro dia do Beyblade World Championships em Moscou e, quando os Bladebreakers deixam o hotel, eles ainda no conseguiram localizar Kai que est desaparecido h algum tempo.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E43

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E45

programme.title: Agora que Kai finalmente leal aos Bladebreakers, ele devolve o Black Dranzer a Boris, causando srios danos sede inimiga no processo.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E46

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers esto presos na estril Tundra Russa aps seu encontro com o Neo Borg, quando Oliver e Enrique misteriosamente aparecem em um nibus.

programme.title: As finais do campeonato mundial esto prestes a comear e Kai insiste em Beybattling primeiro, esperando que seu conhecimento do Neo Borg lhe d uma vantagem sobre o primeiro lutador do Neo Borg, Serge.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E48

programme.title: Aps a primeira derrota de Kai para o Neo Borg na World Beyblade Finals, a vez de Rei assumir o quarto membro do Neo Borg - agora apresentado como Bryan, descrito como um competidor poderoso e implacvel.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E49

programme.title: Sin contacto con el mundo exterior, aunque las cmaras de transmisin an pueden capturar imgenes de alguna manera a travs de la gruesa pared de hielo, comienza la segunda ronda.

programme.title: Inuyasha exige saber por que Kikyo deu os fragmentos da Jia que ela roubou de Agome para Narak, que libera um youkai com chifres.

programme.title: Sesshomaru leva as presas do falecido Goshinki ao renegado aprendiz de Totosai, Kaijinbo, para fazer uma nova espada, enquanto Totosai repara Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E17

programme.title: A batalha de Kaijinbo com Inuyasha, empunhando a espada Tokijin, termina em destruio, e Kagura sente uma abertura para Sesshomaru destruir seu irmo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E18

programme.title: Kuga quer se vingar de Narak pela morte de seus membros da tribo. Quando o mais novo lacaio de Narak, Juromaru, o desafia, ele tem sua chance.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E19

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de uma briga com Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Narak planeja se livrar dos sentimentos de Onigumo por Kikyo dentro dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E20

programme.title: No presente, Agome sente que Inuyasha escolheu Kikyo, e decide nunca mais voltar ao passado depois de devolver os fragmentos da Jia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E21

programme.title: Sango encontra os corpos de seu pai e os outros exterminadores nas runas do castelo de Narak. Seu irmo Kohaku ainda vive, mas ele perdeu a memria.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E22

programme.title: O irmo de Sango, Kohaku, foi possudo por Narak e est tentando matar Agome. Enquanto isso, Inuyasha e Mirok continuam lutando contra Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E23

programme.title: Sesshomaru visita o youkai da rvore Bokusen-Oh buscando os segredos da transformao de Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Sango se preocupa com um Kohaku inconsciente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E24

programme.title: Inuyasha se transforma em um youkai quando sua vida corre perigo. Ele rapidamente acaba com Gatenmaru, que se transformou. Ele ataca os bandidos que esto escapando com suas garras, e ele no pode ouvir Agome tentando par-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E25

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai com a Tessaiga quebrada. Sua prpria presa usada para consert-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E26

programme.title: Ryukotsusei tira a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e ele se transforma em um youkai. Totosai diz a todos para recuar porque esto em perigo, mas Agome decide ficar para trs.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E27

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Shippo conhece uma garota chamada Satsuki. Satsuki acredita que seu irmo, que foi guerra, voltar. Ela mostra a Shippo o tesouro que seu irmo lhe deu, um fragmento de Jia. Infelizmente, apenas uma flor feita de pedra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E1

programme.title: Os maridos esto sendo atrados para longe de sua aldeia por uma bela youkai. Suas esposas pedem a Mirok para derrot-la. Preocupado com ele, Sango o acompanha. Mas Sango separada dele por uma nvoa estranha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E2

programme.title: Sango volta para a vila dos exterminadores para consertar seu Osso Voador. Indo para o poo, Agome encontra uma Nimenka, uma fruta que parece um rosto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E3

programme.title: Tokajin sequestra Agome. Inuyasha escapa do jardim em miniatura com a ajuda de Mirok e os outros e vai salvar Agome. Enquanto escapa, ele encontra uma flor com o rosto de um velho sbio.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E4

programme.title: Sango retorna para a sua vila e conserta o Osso Voador. Ela tambm coloca o pai e as cinzas de seus companheiros para descansar. Quando ela est prestes a sair, ela atacada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E5

programme.title: Narak chama uma sacerdotisa chamada Tsubaki. H cinquenta anos ela foi derrotada por Kikyo quando foi atrs da Jia. Ela uma sacerdotisa sombria que vendeu sua alma a um youkai para manter sua juventude e agora est atrs do sangue de Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E6

programme.title: Agome luta contra a maldio colocada por Tsubaki, uma sacerdotisa sombria. Enquanto isso, Kikyo aparece diante de Tsubaki.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E7
